embeds.title: Konfes Help
embeds.description: Konfes allows you to send a message anonymously to a server through your unique configurable avatar. Konfes is open source at https://github.com/obediqbal/konfes

fields.name: Commands:
fields.value:
***/send*** `message` `attachments`
Send a message anonymously through your avatar.

***/avatar*** `nickname` `avatar_url`
A shorthand to setup the configuration of your avatar. Default is *Anonymous*.

***/help***
Learn about my commands.
